notes:
CHANGELOG (Current 2.5.2 vs. Previous 2.3.6):
Fixed incorrect device type detection for some devices
Fixed web interface not working on some devices
Fixed disabled SSID/pass fields

Read/write IEEE for CC chips
Default black theme
Add device mac to MDNS ZeroConf
Breaking change! socket_uptime in /ha_sensors and /metrics now in seconds
New 5 languages
Add manual ZB OTA for 06M
Add warning modal for ZB manual OTA
WireGuard can now use hostname instead of IP
WiFi AP fixes and improvements
Improved management of socket clients
Fix "Disable web server when socket is connected"
Fix events tag for log
Fix ZB maual OTA header text
Fix feedback page stack overflow
Fix sta drop in AP mode after scan start
